title: Pintodd crew
content:
You may have noticed them in the app: The PintoddÂ crew is one of the most famous crew and keeps exciting us with their vids and pics. Based in Lyon (France) often rippinâ€™ HDV (understand hereÂ« Hotel de Ville Â» iconic spot) they are hungry enough to krak the world.

“Yo les chicken dips! Can you explain the name of yourÂ crew.

Felix : so we were just some friends hangin out together some times to hit the streets. During one of these sesh, we just tripped on the word “pintade” that means “guinea fowl” in french. The following evening, I proposed them to create a team, a crew, and we choose the name “Pintodd” cause it sounds like “pintade”, but is a bit different. The double ‘d’ at the end is much better, it sounds better. So in fact, we are the ‘GuineaFowl Crew‘ haha!

“Who are you, where did you met?

EnzoÂ : first, we are French, we are ‘lyonnais’ (from Lyon). We’re skateboarders who just skate and laugh out loud. We all met in HdV (hotel de ville) and progressively we’ve been skating together.

“Do you have a motto?Â Something core to PintoddÂ crew?

‘Fuck da police!â€™ haha

“Whoâ€™s the most funny in the crew?

Tibo: I guess the most funny is Harry, cause he’s always doing shit, talking shit.Â 


(translation “My new GoPro”)

– The most talented?

David: ME
Harry: No it’s me!
Aurelien: Shut up guyz, you all know I am the best! Haha
Enzo: There is no real comparison between us, and that’s true: we all know the best is Aurelien. He progresses so fast that’s incredible.

– The most fucked-up?

Felix: Harry

-The chicks addict?

Haha make your own idea

“Any favorite spot in Lyon (after HDV of course)?

David: We often skate in X-Rousse or in Confluence.

“Any annecdote about a skate sesh?

Aurelien: We have always funny bails but we remember this sesh in a lil park in Lyon (Blandan): skate friends and sun was the perfect combo, we donâ€™t need anything else!

(translation: “Max doesn’t like cheap lemonade”)

“Do you have sponsors?

Tibo: except AurÃ©lien, none of us have sponsors, but some are doing the best to search one. Video coming soon ðŸ˜‰

“Where can we find ya?

KRAK OF COURSE and also in HdV ! Enjoy your day, go hit the streets and FUCK DA POLICE!

THANKS PEEPS!Â 

>> Pintoodd crew >>
Aurelien Giraud, Enzo Di Litta, David Vernay, Harry Bertrand, Max Colombel, Tibo Rebie, FÃ©lix Baillet.
author: kev
